ğŸğŸŒ·The Therapeutic Gardens is a great addition indeed, considering the country's fast aging population.
ğŸµï¸Fun fact:
The Boccia Court at Punggol Park is the first in Singapore.
Boccia mean "to bowl" in Italian.
It is played by motor-impaired wheelchair users.
The aim of the game is to bowl balls as close as possible to a white target ball called the jack.

A truly captivating garden! Visiting during the golden hour (6:30 p.m. to 7:30 p.m.) is an ideal time to explore the diverse plant species, enjoying the cooler weather and the enchanting lighting conditions.
Newly opened garden in Punggol Park as part of park extension. Great for clearing your mind and listening to the nature ğŸƒ.
Brand new and refreshing experience at this otherwise old charming park
